ModMetaData.description:
Pawn Editor - Community Fork maintained by Segas Wolf.
Stability and compatibility fixes for RimWorld 1.6. Original mod created by ISOR3X / legodude17.
v2.0.2 update: - In-game top-right Pawn Editor button now requires Dev Mode + God Mode. - In-game Edit gizmo continues to require Dev Mode + God Mode. - Social tab now defaults to showing all relations on first open.
